data.name: Uber Destruction
data.detailed_description:
Uber Destruction is a 2D fast-pace side-scrolling rogue-lite
featuring many traditional mechanics you know and love!
The game carries many different elements that create a fun, and
chaotic atmosphere so that you can become "Thee Über Destructor".
What could all this jam packed fun look like? Take a peak at the images below!

Hoards of Immense Challenging Foes!


The roads will be swarmed with all sorts of crazy beings...
Survive long enough and you'll just see how scary it gets!

An Armory of Weapons To Blaze With!


Over 30+ unique weapons, all with different rarities, you'll have
a hard time picking your favorite!

Hella Cool Upgrades!


A variety of very rewarding perks that enhance
the gameplay giving you much more power!

That's not all!

Uber destruction also includes:
  • Progression saving after each complete level
  • More rewarding and Chaotic madness as you progress
  • Couch Co-op with a friend (Requires Controller!)
    Possibly online multiplayer in the near future
  • In-game currency to earn and spend during gameplay

Stay tuned!

data.short_description: Uber Destruction is a 2D fast-pace side-scrolling rogue-lite featuring intense battles with immense hoards of enemies, scaling difficulty, an arsenal of weaponry, and a variety of obtainable upgrades. Take the wheel and drive through the bullet hell madness!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
